Pomodoro technique

21 Aug 2017

I am reliving my habit of Pomodoro technique. I used to apply it to my life when my work schedule was crazy. Since Iâ€™m driven to self-directing learning, I need to bring this habit back.

My Pomodoro technique will follow this sequence:

  1. Work for 25 minutes (pomodoro = 1)
  2. Break for 5 minutes
  3. If pomodoro < 4, repeat step 1; otherwise, break for 15 minutes
  4. Repeat step 1 (to complete more tasks)
